author: Maxdrake

text:
@Arc13 They DEFINITELY need Mike from StarTropics in the next one if they're gonna add characters like Rob, Pit and the Ice Climbers.  On the one hand you could say he'd be too similar to Ness since his main weapon is a yo-yo, but there's so much more to him than that...

Anyway, yeah, I take pride in actually knowing about and loving Kid Icarus a good 20 years before Brawl came out, but I'm glad it got people re-interested in the series.  Man, this music is still my favorite.

It took me forever to actually take the time to beat the first level, but once i did it i couldn't believe how much variety there is to this game in terms of level design.
